EmailTemplate.name: TSE: AWS re:Invent-Las Vegas 11_26_18.Follow Up Email 1 - Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Everything You Need to Know from AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>
Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, You're invited to join our next webinar, Top 5 Takeaways from AWS re:Invent 2018, on Wednesday, December 5th at 11 a.m. ET, <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]> for a post-event recap from event attendee and Director of Technical Marketing, Eric Wright.
Reserve Your Seat <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]> In this <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>30-minute live webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>, we will review the top announcements from AWS re:Invent, what to expect in the cloud in 2019, and how organizations like yours are benefitting from migrating their workloads to AWS. All registered guests will be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there! Regards, Catherine PS. If you can't attend live, feel free to sign up anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>, and I'll send you the recording afterward.
